title: Underwater Welding: Techniques, Challenges, and Advancements

comments.text: Interesting article on underwater welding – directly relevant to building and maintaining undersea habitats.  The challenges highlighted, especially with wet welding, underscore the need for robust, corrosion-resistant materials in hyperbaric environments; a crucial factor for my seasteading ambitions.
